Headline: Brown Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line service has has resumed and trains are moving with significant delays due to a stalled train at Kimball.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service has has resumed and trains are moving with significant delays due to a stalled train at Kimball.

As a result of the delay:

  • Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service  between  Kimball  and Belmont, in both directions, and will conclude at 11:45 p.m.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
